name: Little Bit About Jonathan Frakes Online Trivia | Celebrities | 10 Questions

questions.explanation:
Pennsylvania.

	He was born on August 19, 1952 in Bethlehem, Pennsylvania.  For those of you who thought it was Alaska, that was the birthplace of his character William Riker on "Star Trek: The Next Generation".

Genie Francis.

	Jonathan and Genie were married on May 28, 1988.  Genie Francis is best known for her role as Laura Spencer on "General Hospital".  Marina Sirtis and Gates McFadden are actresses on "Star Trek: TNG".  Deanna Troi is a character on "Star Trek: TNG".

questions.text: How many children of his were born in the 1990s?
questions.explanation:
2.

	Elizabeth Francis was born on May 30, 1997 and James Ivor was born on August 20, 1994.

questions.text: What film about a kid that had an amazing watch did Jonathan Frakes direct?
questions.explanation:
Clockstoppers.

	In "Clockstoppers" a kid finds a watch his father invented that can stop time around it.  In "Spykids 2" the main character has a watch that can do everything but tell time.  "Somewhere in Time" was a romance movie starring Jane Seymour and Christopher Reeve.  I made up "Time Stands Still".

questions.text: Which science-fiction character was Jonathan Frakes best known for?
questions.correct: Commander William Riker & Will Riker & William T. Riker & Riker
questions.explanation:
Commander William Riker & Will Riker & William T. Riker & Riker

	Commander William T. Riker of the Starship Enterprise from "Star Trek: The Next Generation".  When you see Will playing the trombone it is really Jonathan Frakes playing it.

questions.text: Which hospital based television series did he direct one episode for?
questions.explanation:
Diagnosis Murder.

	The episode was "Left Handed Murder" in the 1995-96 season.  Diagnosis Murder starred Dick Van Dyke and Barry Van Dyke.

questions.text: Which of these science fiction series was Jonathan Frakes the executive producer of in the late 1990s and early 2000s?
questions.explanation:
Roswell.

	Roswell can be seen on UPN.

questions.text: What is the name of the production company he formed with Lisa J. Olin?
questions.explanation:
Geopp Circle Productions.

	Geopp Circle Productions is based at Paramount Pictures.

questions.text: What mini-story series was Jonathan Frakes the host of?
questions.explanation:
Beyond Belief: Fact or Fiction.

	"Beyond Belief: Fact or Fiction" tells you 5 stories and you have to decide which stories are based on fact and which ones are fiction.  It can sometimes be difficult to decide.

questions.text: Who else of "Star Trek" fame does Jonathan Frakes share a birthday with?
questions.explanation:
Gene Roddenberry.

	Gene Roddenberry was the creator of "Star Trek".
